basics.name: Jordan Lambert
basics.label: Junior Software Engineer
basics.summary: Profile combining strong technical mastery (FullStack, DevOps, AI) with a creative mindset for solving complex problems, and a constant commitment to performance and the delivery of high-quality solutions.

education.description: Master's Thesis in AI: Identification of Code Defects Present in Systems Generated by LLMs.
Double degree path specializing in CS and Management.

experience.name: Armtek
experience.summary: Development of a data processing tool to convert technical documentation to the S1000D standard into a TypeScript format usable by a web application.
highlights: Standardized 80% of client technical documentation to S1000D format.
Facilitated daily work and served as a business argument to attract new clients in aerospace/defense.

experience.name: Spherea Tests & Services
experience.position: Data Transformation Intern - IFS ERP Project
experience.summary: Migration and unification of subsidiary data to a central ERP. Management of ETL process for thousands of records.
highlights: Resolved data inconsistencies and aligned repositories for smooth integration.
Enabled real-time access to unified/reliable data for the entire group.

experience.name: PriceComparator
experience.summary: Development of a Node.js script automating the analysis, cleaning, and saving of newsletters.
highlights: Standardized 100% of newsletters into JSON via custom parsing.
Reduced manual processing time by 90% (saving ~2 hours/day).

experience.name: Service à Dom'
experience.summary: Developed and deployed a cross-platform application with Flutter (Dart) for iOS and Android.
highlights: Automated entry and processing of paper forms.
Reduced form processing time from 1 hour to 5 minutes (85% savings).
